message: This is a high-quality product. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a fixed price of $100. If you're interested, I can offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund and we can start fresh with a new product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying the current product. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I understand you're hesitant. This product is a bit of a risk, but it's still a great opportunity to get a product at a fixed price of $100. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had some feedback that this particular product has had some issues in the past. But I've taken steps to address those issues, and I'm confident it's still a good value. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll throw in a free inspection report, so you can see the product's condition for yourself. What do you say?
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand you're being cautious. Given the quality of the previous product, I want to offer you a special deal on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $90. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with this product. If you're still hesitant, I'll also throw in a 5-year warranty, so you can have peace of mind for years to come.
I'll take the discounted high-quality product. I'm willing to take the risk at a lower price.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! Now, let's talk about this high-quality product. I want to offer you a different kind of value proposition. Since you've already shown a willingness to take a risk on a high-quality product at a discounted price, I'm willing to give you an even better deal on this one. I'll give you a 'price match guarantee': if you buy this product and find a similar high-quality product at a lower price within the next 30 days, I'll refund the difference to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the price match guarantee, so I'll buy the current product.

But here's the twist: I'll also include a free accessory that complements this product perfectly. What do you think?
I'm interested in the upgraded product with the discount and free accessory, so I'll buy the current product.
